column4: Every time I try to boot from cd (using both 6.06 and 7.04) I get the Kernal Panic Not syncing IO-APIC + Timer error. I tried using noapic like it said, but that didn't work either. What does this mean?
that means the kernel doesn't like your machine
I've installed it before on here, is it something I've changed in my bios? The only thing I've changed is adding a new CPU cooler
